amendment.description: To provide the Secretary of Agriculture with the necessary funding to effectively address the critical water and waste water needs of rural communities in the United States.

vote.text: Amendment SA 633 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 633 proposed by Senator Conrad for Senator Dole. (consideration: CR S3698-3702; text: CR S3700) To provide the Secretary of Agriculture with the necessary funding to effectively address the critical water and waste water needs of rural communities in the United States.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 633 proposed by Senator Conrad for Senator Dole.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 633 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
